title: Composite p-branes on Product of Einstein Spaces
abstract: A multidimensional gravitational model with several scalar fields, fields of forms and cosmological constant is considered. When scalar fields are constant and composite p-brane monopole-like ansatz for the fields of forms is adopted, a wide class of solutions on product of n+1 Einstein spaces is obtained. These solutions are the composite p-brane generalizations of the Freund-Rubin solution. Some examples including the AdS_m x S^k x... solutions are considered.
